txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Forge an expert ice-pick for the workers of Wildermore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled weaponsmith such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by forging an expert ice-pick for them.

'[placeholder], I hear you have skill in the forging of fine weapons. The people of Wildermore have a unique problem of late: our ice-picks break against the ice, and we waste much of our effort in repairing them.\n\n'Would you be able to make something stronger?'
Hildelith has given you a recipe for an expert ice-pick.\n\nYou should forge an expert ice pick for the workers trying to break the ice left by NÃºrzum.
'Ah! This is of much better quality than the ones the workers have been using. What an excellent donation to the workers, [placeholder]! I will be sure that they receive this gift at once.'
Deliver the expert ice-pick to Hildelith
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have forged an expert ice-pick and should now deliver it to Forlaw.
